description: The Sentinel-2 Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) is a proxy to quantify the vegetation amount. It is defined as NDVI=(NIR-Red)/(NIR+Red) where NIR corresponds to the reflectance in the near infrared band , and Red to the reflectance in the red band. It is closely related to FAPAR and is little scale dependant.
title: Sentinel-2 Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) (tiles) - V2
